Pipeline Event Log | Sample Synoptic Map Keywords

Sample GONG Synoptic Map FITS Keyword Headers 
Header listing for HDU #1:
SIMPLE  =                    T / Fits standard
BITPIX  =                  -32 / Bits per pixel
NAXIS   =                    2 / Number of axes
NAXIS1  =                  360 / Axis length
NAXIS2  =                  180 / Axis length
EXTEND  =                    F / File may contain extensions
ORIGIN  = 'National Solar Observatory -- GONG' / FITS file originator
OBS-SITE= 'NSO/GONG NETWORK'   / Instrument site location
TELESCOP= 'NSO-GONG'           / NSO/GONG Network
OBS-URL = 'http://gong.nso.edu' / The GONG website
DATE    = '2007-11-02T17:44:00'
DATE-OBS= '2007-11-02'
TIME-OBS= '17:44   '
DATATYPE= 'REAL*4  '           / Type of data
WAVELNTH=                676.8 / Wavelength of obs (nm)
CAR_ROT =                 2063 / Carr-rot. number of position 0.0
WCSNAME = 'Carrington Cylin-equal-area'
CTYPE1  = 'CRLN-CEA'           / Carrington longitude
CTYPE2  = 'CRLT-CEA'           / Carrington sine latitude
CRPIX1  =                180.5 / 180 degrees from initial longitude
CRPIX2  =                 90.5 / Equator of map
CRVAL1  =                  144 / Carrington longitude of map cntr (deg)
CRVAL2  =                   0. / Sine-lat of Equator
PV2_1   =                   1. / Lambda for latitude coordinate
CDELT1  =                   1. / Carrington long. step (deg)
CDELT2  =            0.0111111 / Sine-lat step
WCSNAMEA= 'Carrington-rotation Cylin-equal-area'
CTYPE1A = 'CRN-CEA '           / Carrington rotation number
CTYPE2A = 'CRLT-CEA'           / Carrington sine latitude
CRPIX1A =                180.5 / Half rotation from initial pixel
CRPIX2A =                 90.5 / Equator of map
CRVAL1A =               2062.6 / Carr-rot of map cntr
CRVAL2A =                   0. / Sine-lat of Equator
PV2_1A  =                   1. / Lambda for latitude coordinate
CDELT1A =    -0.00277777777778 / Carrington step (rotation)
CDELT2A =            0.0111111 / Sine-lat step
IMTYPE  = 'MAGNETIC'
NFILETOT=                 9291 / Total number of files included
LONG0   =                  324 / Init. Carr-long. of synoptic map
IMGMN01 =          -0.43127748 / Image mean
IMGRMS01=            2.3616159 / Image RMS (Standard Deviation)
IMGSKW01=          -1.06728172 / Image skewness
IMGMIN01=         -66.34285736 / Image Min
IMGMAX01=          40.08370209 / Image Max
IMGADV01=           1.51597393 / Image Average Deviation
IMGVAR01=            5.5772295 / Image Variance
IMGKUR01=          41.57125854 / Image Kurtosis
MMREL   = 'v1.28   '
CARROT  =                 2063
BUNIT   = 'Gauss   '
LONGMC  =                  83.
LONGIMC =                   83
LONGADJ =            0.1811703
MAPCOUNT=                 9291
MAPL0   =                   24
MAPEDGE =                  324
CREDGE  =               2063.1 / Carr-rot of map left edge
CRNOW   =        2062.93283008 / Carr-rot of Now
CR60    =        2062.93333333 / Carr-rot of 60 degrees in
CRCENTER=               2062.6 / Carr-rot of map cntr
MAPNAME = '2063_324'
MAPDATE = '2007-11-02'         / UT Date of this map (i.e. of last contributor)
MAPTIME = '17:44   '           / UT Time of this map (i.e. of last contributor)
FILELIST= 'mrbql071102t1744c2063_324'
COMMENT
COMMENT Please note:
COMMENT This is an hourly GONG product with UT date MAPDATE and UT time MAPTIME
COMMENT which is between 59.5 and 60.5 degrees from the left edge in the
COMMENT Carrington frame.
COMMENT
COMMENT This GONG product is produced from the QRII data stream.
COMMENT
COMMENT See http://gong.nso.edu for more information about GONG.
COMMENT
PLATFORM= 'Linux redhat NOAO/IRAF V2.11EXPORT'
FITSWASH= '$RCSfile: HEADERS.html,v $ $Revision: 1.3 $ $Date: 2007/09/27 20:49'
END
